IGMPlot
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which IGMPlot installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using IGMPlot, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load IGMPlot/2.4.2-iccifort-2019.5.281
```
